Enclosing class:
TablePostProcessor
private class TablePostProcessor.MiscProcessor
extends TablePostProcessor.MarkupProcessor

MiscProcessor is a MarkupProcessor for BBF markup that denotes empty or null values.

theNulls

private IndexedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> theNulls()
theNulls constructs and returns a HashMap with String keys for types of data, and String values for their null type.

Returns:
the map, as described.

getTheNull

private java.lang.String getTheNull(java.lang.String str)
getTheNull returns a string representation of the nulltype for the data type passed, null if none known.

Parameters:
str - - the data type
Returns:
- a string representation of the nulltype for the data type, or null itself if none is found.

processMarkups

void processMarkups(java.lang.String input,
                    Table t,
                    java.lang.String rowName,
                    Row r,
                    int typeCol,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> refNames)
Description copied from class: TablePostProcessor.MarkupProcessor
processMarkups processes the input string, possibly using the Table, Row, and integer passed, stripping the string of BBF markup, and processing aStatement as described in the Template.

Overrides:
processMarkups in class TablePostProcessor.MarkupProcessor
Parameters:
input - - a string from the table.
t - - the table that the string is found in.
r - - the row that the string is found in.
typeCol - - the index of the column in the row that will have type information.
